scenario_text.value: Eh, hehehe...
Agumon? What are you acting so giggly about?

I was thinking back on all the things you’ve
told me.
You’ve made me so happy!

Oh jeeze, don’t start thanking me all over
again or you’re gonna make me blush.
So, Takuma, like Falcomon was saying...

I don’t know what’s gonna happen to me...
None of us monsters do.

But please, no matter what happens... Keep
believing in me.

I don’t mean the real me... The idea of me in
your mind. Keep that alive.
What’re you talking about, Agumon?

(What’s he trying to tell me? He wants me to
believe in my own version of him?)

(What’s my version of Agumon like? Outgoing?
Supportive? Kind?)

(He has many sides, but if I were to choose
the one that stands out most...)
(I’d say that for me, Agumon is...)
Dependable.
Partner and protector.
A simple, kind friend.
Dependable.

I believe in you, Agumon. Especially in how
dependable you are.
Dependable, you say?

You take the lead and are always doing
everything you can to protect me.
I know I can depend on you for that.
Kind to everyone.

You’re so kind, always protecting everyone
including me.
That makes me really believe in you.
So you think I’m kind? Interesting...

Well, you run around trying to make us feel
better when you’re worried about us, right?

Oh, that? I’m just trying to imitate you!
Hehe...
Innocent and humble.

You’re so pure. You smile when you’re happy
and look down when you’re sad.

I know I can trust you to be honest, without
any ulterior motives.
Oh, really? Hehe...
I’m just doing my best to keep you safe!
And I appreciate that, Agumon.

(We should be able to find some clues about
how to get out of this world soon.)
(Without Agumon having to fight, hopefully.)
(This is it. Laugh or cry, do-or-die...)
I’ll do my best to protect you, Takuma!
